title: What to expect at the Oscars
description:
Several unexpected storylines have emerged throughout this awards season. It all comes to a close Sunday with the 91st annual Academy Awards. TicToc's Jennifer Zabasajja and Andrew Mach speak to Bloomberg's Anousha Sakoui about what to expect from this year's show.
FOLLOW UP
Anousha's latest report: ‘Inclusion Riders’ Make Inroads a Year After Star Turn on Oscars
You can follow Anousha at: @anoushasakoui
----
TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
